column5: yeah it was on the news last night  soon I will get an email saying it was caught on the Nottawasaga or Simcoe
Isn't that the same one they caught on L of the Woods???
The Fraser is very high on my bucket list.  That things a tank.
That guy must be in great shape to fight that beast for 1 1/2 hours. Good for him.
An hour and a half for a 1100lb fish?  Did they have it attached to a winch?  LOL
I thought I had heard 4 hours was the fight time.

What a feeling it must have been for the guide , to put a customer onto a fish of that size and than to watch him land it , PRICELESS .... Its a guides dream to have a client land the fish of his life , its why we do it ... Great fish so good to see there is still some of these beasts still out there .. What a beast
